BEFORE:
if self.reshape:

            x = x.transpose(1, -1)
            dims = x.shape

            x = x.reshape(dims[0] * dims[1], dims[2])

        # Applying dropout
        x_drop = self.drop(x)

        # Retrieving the original shape format
        if self.reshape:
            x_drop = x_drop.reshape(dims[0], dims[1], dims[2])
            x_drop = x_drop.transpose(1, -1)

        return x_drop
